mapper.select: select vehicle_type as vehicleType, payment_type as paymentType, seoul_cost as seoulCost, gwangju_cost as gwangjuCost, daegu_cost as daeguCost, daejeon_cost as daejeonCost, busan_cost as busanCost, ulsan_cost as ulsanCost, incheon_cost as incheonCost, gangwon_cost as gangwonCost, gyeonggi_cost as gyeonggiCost, gyeongnam_cost as gyeongnamCost, gyeongbuk_cost as gyeongbukCost, jeonnam_cost as jeonnamCost, jeonbuk_cost as jeonbukCost, chungnam_cost as chungnamCost, chungbuk_cost as chungbukCost, jeju_cost as jejuCost, sejong_cost as sejongCost from vehicle_cost
